name: Backroom (The Backroom Lasts)
description:
This game is a mixture of Game "Outlast" and creepy pasta "Backroom".

You must Find every books to escape this Backroom. 

However,  beware of "it". that can't hear you, but it can see you "Well" even if you are in the darkness.

If it sees you, hide in the narrow place. You can't play with him by running.

Don't worry about the darkness. You can use camcorder's flashlight!

Press WASD to move, and press left mouse to use camcorder.

You can toggle flash light with R, and toggle camcorder with F.

.....This game is currently in developing, so feel free to give feedbacks to this solo noob developer!

+ I'm gonna publish this to steam and google playstore soon, So wait for the updates!
